page.title: 16HOME LIFE FRECKLETON CHILD
page.content: I've only been living in Freckleton for two weeks,but I'm quite settled in.At school I feel very left behind with the work.I seem to be struggling to try and tch up.At my old house(which was in Glossop,Derbyshire)The estate that I lived on was out in the hills.But in Frekleton my new house is right in the middle of the village and afew miles from the sea.In my old house it was about 75miles.I preferred Glossop for shops because there were 2 supermarkets,a toyshop,swimming baths and many more shops and services.In Freckleton there are only a few shops and public services aren't very good,but I perfer my new house to all my other 4 houses.The houses were,Broamway(on the Wirral),Knutsford(Cheshire),Oswestry(Sa lop)and Glossop(Derbyshire).
